comments: AMWELSH coal charter party with comprehensive stoppage configurations based on GRL rules analysis

RAIN.description: Rain - stops operations for bulk cargo protection
RAIN.notes: Rain typically stops operations for coal cargo. Time excluded from laytime.

SWELL.description: Heavy swell / sea too rough for operations
SWELL.notes: Swell conditions preventing safe cargo operations. Time excluded.

HIGH_WINDS.notes: Wind conditions preventing cargo operations. Time excluded.

FOG.notes: Poor visibility affecting operations. Time excluded.

BAD_WEATHER.notes: Generic bad weather event covering multiple conditions. Time excluded.

EXTREME_TEMPERATURE.notes: Temperature conditions preventing safe operations. Time excluded.

HIGH_HUMIDITY.notes: Humidity affecting certain bulk cargoes. Time excluded.

STORM.notes: Severe weather - vessel safety priority. Time excluded.

ICE_CONDITIONS.notes: AMWELSH Ice Clause: Port inaccessible by reason of ice. Time excluded.

HOLDS_PREPARATION.notes: Hold preparation time typically excluded from laytime.

HOLDS_INSPECTION.notes: AMWELSH 93 Cargill: 3 hours allowed for hold inspection. Some forms: 2-4 hours allowance.

HOLDS_REJECTED.description: Holds rejected by surveyor / not ready
HOLDS_REJECTED.notes: Holds not acceptable - further cleaning required. NOR becomes invalid.

DEBALLASTING.notes: Deballasting time typically excluded from laytime.

SHIFTING.notes: AMWELSH standard: Time used counts. Some variations: Shifting on demurrage. Charter party specific.

STRIKE.notes: AMWELSH 93: 'Strikes, time lost to count as one-half laytime'. AMWELSH 93 CET: Fully excluded (0.0). Variable by terms.

SHIP_EQUIPMENT_BREAKDOWN.notes: Ship's equipment breakdown counts toward laytime (owner's responsibility).

SHORE_EQUIPMENT_BREAKDOWN.notes: Shore equipment breakdown excluded (not owner's fault).

CONGESTION.notes: Congestion handling varies. Standard: counts unless WIBON. Depends on specific terms.

HOLIDAY.notes: SHEX: Holidays excluded unless used. SHINC: Holidays count even if not used. ArcelorMittal: Always excluded.

FAILED_INSPECTION.notes: Failed inspection - vessel/owner responsibility. Time counts.

CUSTOMS_INSPECTION.notes: Reasonable time for customs inspection excluded.

FORCE_MAJEURE.notes: Force majeure events beyond parties' control. Time excluded.

WAITING_FOR_BERTH.description: Waiting for berth to become available
WAITING_FOR_BERTH.notes: WIBON: Time counts if NOR accepted. Without WIBON: Excluded until berth available.
